title: India's new EV policy not suitable for JLR at present: Tata Motors Group CFO
description: Jaguar Land Rover, Tata Motors' British arm, announced it has no immediate plans to take advantage of India's new EV policy that provides import duty concessions. Though the company finds the policy unsuitable now, it continues to explore CKD manufacturing options. The new policy aims to attract global EV manufacturers to India.
